## Description
Popular world wonders I like and its estimated annual number of visits as weight.

### Prepare Data
```{r}
name <- c("Alhambra","Chichén Itzá","Colosseum","Great Pyramid of Giza","Niagara Falls","Petra","Stonehenge")
latitude <-c(37.17695,,,29.979167,,30.328611,51.178889)
longitude <- c(-3.59001,,,31.134167,,35.441944,-1.826111)
visits <- c(2000000,,,8200000,,,1000000,800000)

wonders <- data.frame(name = name,
                      latitude = latitude,
                      longitude = longitude,
                      visits = visits)
library(leaflet)

```
